summary: Email chain between FBI personnel and a forensic examiner regarding the status of digital evidence (hard drives) from the Epstein case. The examiner confirms devices are available for review via the CAIR system and discusses logistics for shipping additional evidence to the Southern District of New York (SDNY).

persons.name: NY CART Coordinator Senior Forensic Examiner
persons.context: Coordinates the forensic examination of digital evidence (hard drives) from the Epstein case, confirms availability of devices for review, and arranges shipping to SDNY.

events.title: Email Update on Epstein Digital Evidence
events.description: Forensic examiner provides update on availability of Epstein case digital devices for review via CAIR system and plans to ship additional evidence to SDNY.
personsInvolved: NY CART Coordinator Senior Forensic Examiner

keyFacts: Digital devices and media from the Epstein case have been available for over a year via the FBI's CAIR system for review.
Additional exports of evidence, except for 6 machines, are completed and ready to be shipped to the Southern District of New York.
The forensic examiner was retrieving information from evidence stored in the Bronx that had been previously checked back into storage.
